item.title: Lights Out
item.description: As a kid, I had a handheld version of this game made by Tiger. For my siblings and me, it was neat distraction for a few weeks. Now, with some help from Blender and React, I can make it myself! Clearly, it’s not finished yet. I just wanted to put up my progress with it after a few hours. Getting React and JSX to play nicely with Hugo wasn’t much trouble, and the game’s logic is pretty straightforward.
